user_prompt: Short, high-energy rock instrumental snippet (10–20 seconds), representing the climactic peak of a full song. Fast-paced and powerful (around 130 BPM). Dominant distorted electric guitars playing wide, open power chords with strong rhythmic drive, supported by a tight, punchy bass line locked to the guitar riff. Acoustic drum kit with an aggressive groove: heavy kick, sharp snare accents, and open hi-hats or crash cymbals emphasizing intensity. Lead electric guitar adds expressive melodic phrases or brief solo licks in a minor scale. Full arrangement from the first second — no intro or buildup — maximum energy, thick wall of sound, modern rock / alternative rock character. Instrumental only, no vocals.
